description:
The RealFleece™ High Pile Long Sleeve Half Zip is a warm stylish and ultra-comfortable fleece layer that combines classic outdoor style with the natural benefits of merino wool. Made with a high-pile 100% merino wool fleece, that’s naturally soft, breathable and odor-resistant, this pullover also features icebreaker’s Cool-Lite™jersey in the lining, which combines natural TENCEL® and merino wool to manage moisture. The center dump pocket and front kangaroo pocket stash your phone and other essentials when you’re on the go.

Superfine merino fibers are brushed to create icebreaker RealFleece®, a natural fleece that warms and breathes next to your skin. Silky-soft merino and TENCEL®, sourced from sustainable eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker cool-lite™, a luxurious fabric that naturally regulates your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker RealFleece High Pile LS Half Zip - Mens

specs.value: 60% Lyocell, 40% Merino Wool - Exclusive Of Decoration
